Module com.marginallyClever.NodeGraphCore
Package com.marginallyClever.nodeGraphSwing.editActions

Class ActionUnfoldGraph

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.AbstractAction
com.marginallyClever.nodeGraphSwing.editActions.UnfoldGraphAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditAction, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class ActionUnfoldGraph
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
implements EditAction
Uncollapses all the editor's selected items that are Subgraphs. The new list of selected items will contain all the new graph elements plus any old elements that were not Subgraphs. Each newly exposed graph is positioned relative to the original Subgraph.
Since:
2022-02-21
See Also:
Serialized Form
